questions.question: Hey, what is the system way out here feel like if you take your ship and jump that far?
How much of reality, like the work of SpaceX is an inspiration for the decisions made in this game?
Is there some aspect of that that you can replicate the majestic nature of that in the video game?
What are some elements that changed the way, like how do you make a game that's playable for 20 years?
So what's it take to take a game from the idea to find the final product?
Are there some favorite things to you about that world that just kind of connect you?
Has there ever been a temptation to create not a single player game that's gigantic?
Do you try to keep in your own brain a deadline for the team, a deadline?
Have you been paying attention to the game design of that world, of those worlds?
Did you have low points in your life, dark points or your mind went to a dark place?
So I've always wanted to, it's one of those things like what's on your bucket list?
Are you able to be inside the worlds that you've created and be able to notice them?
So I want to, can you give me a hint when I should have kids?
